    • mapReadyCountDownLatch

      private CountDownLatch mapReadyCountDownLatch
      Latch to prevent map operations before map is ready.  Not really used here but good general practice.

    • googleMapsApiKey

      private String googleMapsApiKey
      The Google Maps API key to use.   Can hard-code it here if not available through the ICmd2ModelAdapter.  

    • owlMapControl

      private provided.owlMaps.control.IOwlMapControl owlMapControl
      The map control object.  Not available until the onMapLoadFn runs.

    • GameModel

      public GameModel​(IGameModel2ViewAdapter adapter, common.receiver.INamedReceiver server, boolean team, common.receiver.INamedReceiver player, UUID gameID, common.adapter.ICmd2ModelAdapter cmd2ModelApdt, int teamSize)
      Constructor for the GameModel.
      Parameters:
      adapter - The model to view adapter.
      server - The host of the game.
      team - The team.
      player - The name of the player.
      gameID - The game ID.
      cmd2ModelApdt - The command adapter.
      teamSize - The number of players in your team.
